Module it.unipr.shopfx

Package it.unipr.controllers.login

package it.unipr.controllers.login
This package contains all the classes necessary for the management of the login and sign up procedures Through the LoginController and the AdminSignUpController, the two scenes and their interactions are covered
Since:
2.0
Version:
2.0
Author:
Tanzi Manuel 307720, Mamone Maximiliano 308214
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminSignUpController
    This class manages the sign-up scene for the administrator account
    LoginController
    Controller Class of the login scene, also manages the interactions with the connected scenes.
